title: Hanyang New Music Festival
content:
현대음악제
음악대학, 음악대학 작곡과,
전자음악연구소
가 공동으로 주최
개최
5회
일시 : 2017년 5월 16, 17, 19일
주제 : Expanded Color 확장된 음색
프로그램
5월 16일 화 7시 (백남음악관)

Rothko chapel -----------------------------------Morton Feldman
viola, percussion, celesta, choir
저녁의 소묘 ----------------------------------- 김보람(학생선정작품)
Flute, Oboe, Clarinet, Bassoon, Horn, Trumpet, Trombone, Tuba, Percussion
5th Sonate ----------------------------------- Christophe Guyard
Piano solo
Piri -------------------------------------------- 윤이상
피리(전통악기, 박치완)
Rebonds B ------------------------------------ Iannis Xenakis
percussion solo
Metalics -------------------------------------- Yan Maresz
Trumpet(성재창) & electronics

5월 17일 수 7시 30분 (리사이틀홀)

5 stücke --------------------------------------- 윤이상
piano
Dialoque -------------------------------------- 정홍주(학생선정작품)
Flute, Clarinet
우아한 계절 ------------------------------------ 이지형(학생선정작품)
Oboe, Clarinet, Horn, Cello, Percussion
Pezzo Fantasioso ------------------------------- 윤이상
2 Violins, Bassoon
Passacaglia ------------------------------------ Richard Dudas
violin & piano
La Solitude du coureur de fond ------------------ Franck Bedrossian
Saxophone solo
Presto --------------------------------------- Beat Furrer
Flute, Piano

5월 19일 금 7시 (백남음악관)
일본 Phidias Trio 초청연주회

Clarinet trio ----------------------------------- Jonathan Harvey
clarinet in B♭, violin and piano
Anthèmes I ------------------------------------ Pierre Boulez
violin solo
Diafano --------------------------------------- Matías Hancke
Bass-clarinet solo
Redemption ----------------------------------- James Dillon
clarinet, violin and piano
Rain Tree Sketch I ----------------------------- Toru Takemitsu
piano
6 Capricci ------------------------------------- Salvatore Sciarrino
violin solo I.Vivace II.Andante VI.Con brio
Aquatic Aura ---------------------------------- Akira Nishimura
clarinet, piano
ImpulseII --------------------------------------- Luca Francesconi
clarinet, violin and piano
